original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato avidūre nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṁ
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhagavataḥ avidūre nisinnaḥ hoti pallaṅka

original: ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṁsaṭṭho āraddhavīriyo adhicittamanuyutto.
analyzed: ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya appicchaḥ santuṭṭhaḥ pavivittaḥ a sasaṭṭhaḥ āraddha vīriyaḥ adhicitta manuyuttaḥ

original: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ avidūre nisinnaṁ pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya appicchaṁ santuṭṭhaṁ pavivittaṁ asaṁsaṭṭhaṁ āraddhavīriyaṁ adhicittamanuyuttaṁ.
analyzed: addasā khalu bhagavā āyasmantam sāriputtam avidūre nisinnam pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya appiccham santuṭṭham pavivittam a saṭṭham āraddha vīriyam

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
